item.title: [PI] attempt at a ::heal command gone wrong. please help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Try this

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("heal") && c.playerRights >=2) { c.getPA().requestUpdates(); c.playerLevel[3] = 99; c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); c.gfx0(754); c.sendMessage("Your healed cause Love demanded it."); }

item.title: [PI] attempt at a ::heal command gone wrong. please help
item.dc:creator: @iCharizard iCharizard
item.description:
@iCharizard wrote:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("heal") && c.playerRights >= 3){ for (int i = 0; i < 22; i++) { c.playerLevel[3] = 99; c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); c.sendMessage("You have been healed "+ c.playerName +"."); return; } }

I just tried it, so you were just missing return;

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] attempt at a ::heal command gone wrong. please help

item.description:

Here is my code:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("heal") && c.playerRights >= 3){ for (int i = 0; i < 22; i++) { c.playerLevel[3] = 99; c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); c.sendMessage("You have been healed "+ c.playerName +"."); } }

IDK what to do.
